scripts.compile: mkdir -p priv/static/js && browserify web/static/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] --plugins [ transform-inline-environment-variables ] ] --outfile priv/static/js/bundle.js
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p priv/static/css && node-sass --include-path web/static/css web/static/css/style.scss priv/static/css/style.css && cp web/static/css/bootstrap-flatly.min.css priv/static/css/bootstrap-flatly.min.css  && cp web/static/css/bootstrap-3.3.5.min.css priv/static/css/bootstrap-3.3.5.min.css
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p priv/static/fonts && mkdir -p priv/static/images && cp web/static/fonts/* priv/static/fonts/ && cp web/static/images/* priv/static/images/
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build:css && npm run build:assets
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
scripts.watch:js: watchify web/static/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ] -o priv/static/js/bundle.js -v
